com.jeesite.common.beanvalidator

类 BeanValidators

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jeesite.common.beanvalidator.BeanValidators

  • public class BeanValidators
extends java.lang.Object
    JSR303 Validator(SpringSide 5.0.0-RC1/Hibernate Validator 5.4.0.Final)工具类,适合不同的i18n需求。
    从以下版本开始:
    JDK 1.8.0+
    版本:
    jeesite 2.0
    作者:
    jeesite.com team and winnie bear

      调用JSR303的validate方法, 验证失败时抛出ConstraintViolationException.

      • validateWithException

        public static void validateWithException(javax.validation.Validator validator,
                                         java.lang.Object object,
                                         java.lang.Class<?>... groups)
                                  throws javax.validation.ConstraintViolationException
        调用JSR303的validate方法, 验证失败时抛出ConstraintViolationException.
        参数:
        validator - 验证器
        object - 验证对象
        groups - 可变长组
        抛出:
        javax.validation.ConstraintViolationException - 异常

        返回:
